titleStmt.title: Christ his last vvill, and Iohn his legacy In a sermon preached at Clare in Suffolke, by Bezaleel Carter preacher of the word of God at Canham neere to Saint Edmunds Bury.
Christ his last will, and John his legacy.
titleStmt.author: Carter, Bezaleel, d. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Bernard Alsop for Edward Blackemore and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Blazing-Starre in Paules Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
